CustomField.formula: IF(NOT(ISBLANK( ServiceTerritory.Phone_Number__c )), "(" & LEFT(ServiceTerritory.Phone_Number__c , 3) & ") " & MID(ServiceTerritory.Phone_Number__c , 4, 3) & "-" & MID(ServiceTerritory.Phone_Number__c , 7,4) & " " & RIGHT(ServiceTerritory.Phone_Number__c , (LEN(ServiceTerritory.Phone_Number__c ) - 10)), null)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Formula field populates the Phone number based on the Service Territory
CustomField.label: Phone
